name: Clicker Guardians
description:
Join the ranks of the Clicker Guardians in this thrilling idle clicker. Together with warriors, mages and rogues, you’ll embark on an epic journey to save the realm from an ancient evil. You’ll battle hordes of monsters and powerful bosses using a variety of weapons and abilities. It all starts with a single click!

Plays Like a Clicker, Feels Like an RPG


Amass mountains of gold, resources and experience which can be reinvested in your character and companions. Make use of the free crafting system to get your hands on the rarest of items.
You’ll be spoiled for choice on what to upgrade next.

Your Unusual Usual Enemies


Encounter lots of interesting fantasy monsters, all reimagined in a unique voxel look. Turn them to dust by fighting them yourself or lean back and let your fellow Guardians do the job.
Clicker Guardians equally supports active and passive playstyles.

Enough Content to Click for a Lifetime


Progress through a plethora of stages and ascend the ranks of your guild to fight increasingly powerful bosses.
Guardians never sleep, as there is always a new quest around the corner!

Unlock Content in Hometown


Dive deep into the heart of your hometown as you unlock exciting new content. Craft powerful weapons and armor to become an unstoppable force. Upgrade your skills and enchant your gear in the magical forge to reach new heights of power.

Feature Overview

  • Reliable companions
  • Customizable loadouts
  • Craftable equipment
  • Individual skill trees
  • Incremental difficulty levels
  • Seasonal events
  • Special dungeons
